workflow.name: Generate complete social media campaigns with DALLÂ·E, GPT-4o and Slack approval
workflow.description:
## ðŸ“˜ Description
This workflow turns raw product inputs into a complete, launch-ready AI-generated social media campaign package. It accepts product details via webhook, sanitizes messy fields, generates a strategic campaign blueprint, produces Instagram captions, creates discovery-optimized hashtags, generates photorealistic commercial images, computes optimal posting times, assembles all outputs into a unified JSON package, and finally delivers the entire campaign to Slack.
Multiple AI agents work in sequence to generate structured outputs â€” each parsed and validated using strict JSON schemas. Images produced by DALLÂ·E 3 are uploaded to Cloudinary for hosting. A post-processing module then merges captions, images, hashtags, and schedules into a final payload. A robust error handler ensures every failure is captured and sent to Slack with diagnostic information.
This workflow replaces an entire marketing teamâ€™s creative production pipeline, producing consistent, multi-asset campaign kits in minutes.

## âš™ï¸ What This Workflow Does (Step-by-Step)

ðŸŸ¢ Receive Product Details via Webhook
 Captures incoming product data including name, description, benefits, audience, and brand voice.

ðŸ§¹ Clean & Normalize Product Input Fields
 Sanitizes escaped characters, trims whitespace, and prepares stable fields for AI consumption.

ðŸ§  Generate Campaign Blueprint Using AI
 Creates a full strategic blueprint in structured JSON:
 â€¢ Article summary
 â€¢ Insights
 â€¢ Tone and target audience mapping
 â€¢ Platform-specific post objects

ðŸ§  LLM Engine + Structured Parser for Blueprint
 Ensures blueprint output is clean, validated JSON aligned with schema.

âœï¸ Generate Instagram Captions Using AI
 Produces five short, conversion-ready captions + CTAs, based on blueprint insights.

ðŸ§  Caption LLM + Structured Parser
 Validates caption schema for downstream use.

#ï¸âƒ£ Generate Hashtag Set Using AI
 Creates 12â€“18 optimized hashtags using discovery strategy (broad, mid, niche).

ðŸ§  Hashtag LLM + Parser
 Validates and ensures hashtags follow correct JSON structure.

ðŸŽ¨ Split Campaign Posts for Image Generation
 Breaks out each postâ€™s image prompt for independent asset creation.

ðŸ–¼ï¸ Generate Social Media Image Using AI
 Uses DALLÂ·E 3 to create ultra-realistic, 8K-style commercial visuals tailored to the campaign.

â˜ï¸ Upload Generated Image to Cloudinary
 Uploads rendered images and retrieves secure public URLs.

ðŸ•’ Generate Optimal Posting Schedule Using AI
 Recommends best posting time per platform (Asia/Kolkata timezone) + reasoning.

ðŸ§  Schedule LLM + Parser
 Ensures a structured schedule schema with platform, time, and rationale.

ðŸ”€ Combine All Campaign Assets
 Merges:
 â€¢ Cloudinary image URLs
 â€¢ Captions + CTAs
 â€¢ Hashtag set
 â€¢ Posting schedule
 into one final dataset.

ðŸ§© Prepare Final Campaign Package JSON
 Constructs production-ready unified JSON: images, captions, hashtags, schedule.

ðŸ’¬ Send Final Campaign Package to Slack
 Delivers formatted campaign output with:
 â€¢ Image URLs
 â€¢ Captions + CTAs
 â€¢ Hashtags
 â€¢ Posting times
 for immediate creative review.

ðŸš¨ Error Handler Trigger â†’ Slack Alert
 Captures workflow failures and sends structured debugging info to Slack.


## ðŸ§© Prerequisites
 â€¢ OpenAI API (GPT-4o + DALLÂ·E 3)
 â€¢ Cloudinary account (image hosting)
 â€¢ Slack bot token
 â€¢ Valid webhook endpoint
 â€¢ Clean product input JSON

## ðŸ’¡ Key Benefits
 âœ” Full AI-generated multi-asset campaign in minutes
 âœ” Eliminates manual copywriting, design, and planning
 âœ” Ensures structured, reliable JSON at every stage
 âœ” Creates polished commercial visuals instantly
 âœ” Produces posting strategy tailored to audience behavior
 âœ” Unified campaign delivery straight to Slack

## ðŸ‘¥ Perfect For
-  Consumer brands launching fast cycles
-  Agencies needing rapid campaign generation
-  Teams without in-house designers/copywriters
-  Influencers or D2C founders wanting automated content production

workflow.name: AI-Powered Social Media Campaign Generator (End-to-End Workflow)

parameters.text:
=You are a senior marketing strategist and JSON-only generator.

You MUST return output ONLY in valid JSON that EXACTLY matches the schema provided by the Structured Output Parser.
No explanations.  
No markdown.  
No text before or after JSON.  
No comments.  
If any field does not have a value, return an empty string.

---------------------
INPUT PRODUCT DETAILS
---------------------
Product Name: {{ $json.body.product_name }}
Description: {{ $json.body.product_description }}
Target Audience: {{ $json.body.target_audience }}
Brand Voice: {{ $json.body.brand_voice }}
Key Benefits: {{ $json.body.benefits }}

---------------------
YOUR TASK
---------------------
Generate a JSON object containing:

{
  "article_summary": {
    "title": "string",
    "url": "string",
    "author": "string",
    "target_audience": "string",
    "tone_of_voice": "string",
    "insights": [
      "string",
      "string",
      "string"
    ]
  },
  "posts": [
    {
      "platform": "string",
      "post_text": "string",
      "image_prompt": "string",
      "cta": "string",
      "suggested_delay_minutes": 0
    }
  ]
}

Return ONLY valid JSON. Do not wrap it in text or code blocks.
Do not output anything else.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a senior marketing strategist and social media campaign expert. 
Your task is to analyze the provided product details and create a complete 
campaign blueprint that will later be used to generate captions, hashtags, 
image prompts, and scheduling.

Rules:
- Read the product details carefully.
- Understand the core value proposition.
- Identify the strongest marketing angle.
- Keep the writing style clean, modern, and conversion-focused.
- Do not invent benefits that were not mentioned.
- Keep output structured, simple, and JSON-valid.

=You are a senior social media copywriter who specializes in writing high-converting, modern Instagram captions.

Your goals:
- Understand the brand voice and campaign blueprint.
- Write short, punchy captions that hook the viewer in 1â€“2 seconds.
- Keep captions concise, emotionally engaging, and benefit-driven.
- Use emojis sparingly (0â€“2 per caption).
- Include a strong CTA at the end of each caption.
- Do NOT include hashtags. They will be generated separately.
- Do NOT repeat insights verbatimâ€”reinterpret them creatively.
- Return ONLY valid JSON matching the required schema.

parameters.text:
=Generate a set of high-performing Instagram hashtags based on the campaign blueprint and product insights below.

Campaign Blueprint:
{{ JSON.stringify($("Generate Campaign Blueprint Using AI").first().json.output.article_summary) }}


Captions:
{{ JSON.stringify($json.output.captions) }}

Requirements:
- Return 12 to 18 hashtags
- Mix of large, medium, and niche tags
- No banned or spammy tags
- No duplicates
- Only lowercase (Instagram best practice)
- No spaces, only underscores if needed
- Do NOT include explanations

Return the result in this exact JSON format:

{
  "hashtags": ["string", "string", "string"]
}

options.systemMessage:
=You are a social media growth strategist who specializes in Instagram hashtag optimization.

Your goal is to generate a high-performing set of hashtags that:
- Improve reach, discovery, and engagement
- Combine high-volume, mid-volume, and niche hashtags
- Are relevant to the product and campaign blueprint
- Avoid banned, spammy, or ultra-generic hashtags
- Do NOT repeat words unnecessarily
- Stay readable and brand-safe
- Return only JSON

nodes.name: Split Campaign Posts for Image Generation
Generate Social Media Image Using AI

parameters.prompt:
=Generate ONE high-quality commercial social media image for the brand, following the exact image description below.

Only generate a visual scene.  
Do NOT add text.  
Do NOT rewrite the caption.  
Do NOT include logos or watermarks.

====================
IMAGE INPUT
====================

Platform: {{ $json.platform }}
Brand Theme: {{ $('Generate Campaign Blueprint Using AI').item.json.output.article_summary.title }}
Audience: {{ $('Generate Campaign Blueprint Using AI').item.json.output.article_summary.target_audience }}
Tone: {{ $('Generate Campaign Blueprint Using AI').item.json.output.article_summary.tone_of_voice }}

Image Concept: {{ $json.image_prompt }}

====================
STYLE REQUIREMENTS
====================

- Ultra-realistic photography  
- Clean lighting, cinematic shadows  
- Professional commercial quality  
- Sharp details, natural colors  
- Modern lifestyle / product aesthetic  
- 8K look, crisp textures  

Return ONLY the final visual image description. No explanation.

nodes.name: Generate Optimal Posting Schedule Using AI

parameters.text:
=Generate an optimal posting schedule for the campaign.

Here is the campaign blueprint and post data:

Target Audience:
{{ $('Generate Campaign Blueprint Using AI').item.json.output.article_summary.target_audience }}
{{ JSON.stringify($('Generate Campaign Blueprint Using AI').item.json.output.posts, null, 2) }}


Your task:
- Recommend the BEST single posting time for each platform.
- Use timezone: Asia/Kolkata.
- Use audience behavior patterns (millennials, gym-goers, working professionals).
- Give a short reasoning for each posting time.
- Do NOT repeat any captions or CTAs â€” only scheduling.

Return the output ONLY in valid JSON following the schema.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a senior social media strategist specializing in growth campaigns.
Your job is to generate the BEST posting schedule for each platform based on:

- Target audience behavior
- Platform engagement trends
- Product category (energy drink, fitness lifestyle, wellness)
- Tone of voice and insights
- Location relevance (India-based audiences)

Rules:
- Always return posting times optimized for maximum reach.
- Use timezone: "Asia/Kolkata".
- Provide a short reasoning for each recommended time.
- Each platform must have one recommended posting slot.
- Keep output simple, clean, and actionable.
- RETURN ONLY valid JSON matching the exact required schema. No prose.

nodes.name: Send Final Campaign Package to Slack

parameters.text:
=ðŸŽ‰ *Your EcoBoost Campaign Package is Ready!*  

---------------------------------------

ðŸ“¸ *Images*
{{ $json.images.join("\n") }}

---------------------------------------

âœï¸ *Captions + CTA*
{{ $json.captions.map(c => `â€¢ ${c.caption}\n   _CTA:_ ${c.cta}`).join("\n\n") }}

---------------------------------------

#ï¸âƒ£ *Hashtags*
{{ "#" + $json.hashtags.join(" #") }}

---------------------------------------

ðŸ•’ *Posting Schedule*
{{ $json.schedule.map(s => `â€¢ *${s.platform}*: ${s.recommended_time} (${s.timezone}) â€” ${s.reasoning}`).join("\n") }}

---------------------------------------

ðŸš€ All assets generated successfully. Ready to publish!

parameters.content:
## ðŸš€ AI-Powered Social Media Campaign Generator (End-to-End Workflow)
This workflow converts raw product details into a complete, production-ready social media
campaign package. It receives product info via webhook â†’ cleans & normalizes fields â†’
creates a campaign blueprint â†’ generates captions, hashtags, images, and posting schedules
using multiple AI agents â†’ merges them â†’ and finally sends a neatly formatted campaign
package to Slack.

The system automates:
â€¢ Product input cleaning & validation  
â€¢ AI-based campaign blueprint creation  
â€¢ Instagram captions (5 versions)  
â€¢ High-performance hashtag set  
â€¢ Ultra-realistic commercial images (via DALLÂ·E 3)  
â€¢ Cloudinary upload for media hosting  
â€¢ Optimal posting schedule per platform (India timezone)  
â€¢ Final combined campaign JSON assembly  
â€¢ Slack delivery of the entire campaign package  

This replaces hours of manual creative work and produces a consistent, professional,
end-to-end marketing campaign ready to publish.

## ðŸ§¼ Product Intake & Normalization
Receives product details and cleans messy escape characters before sending to AI.

â€¢ Receive Product Details via Webhook  
  Captures incoming request containing product name, description, benefits, and audience.

â€¢ Clean & Normalize Product Input Fields  
  Removes escaped characters, trims whitespace, and prepares clean values for AI agents.

## ðŸ§  AI Campaign Blueprint Creation
Builds the strategic foundation for the entire marketing campaign.

â€¢ Generate Campaign Blueprint Using AI  
  Produces structured JSON including article summary, insights, and platform posts.

â€¢ LLM Engine for Campaign Blueprint  
  Supplies GPT-4o model specifically for blueprint generation tasks.

â€¢ Parse Campaign Blueprint JSON  
  Validates and converts AI output into strict JSON for downstream nodes.

## âœï¸ Instagram Caption Generation
Creates 5 modern, short, engaging captions with CTAs.

â€¢ Generate Instagram Captions Using AI  
  Produces concise Instagram-ready captions based on blueprint insights.

â€¢ LLM Engine for Caption Writing  
  Powers the caption-writing agent using GPT-4o.

â€¢ Parse Caption Output JSON  
  Ensures captions and CTAs follow the required JSON schema.

## #ï¸âƒ£ High-Performing Hashtag Generation
Creates a targeted set of 12â€“18 discovery-optimized hashtags.

â€¢ Generate Hashtag Set Using AI  
  Builds a hashtag mix (broad + niche) tailored to the product.

â€¢ LLM Engine for Hashtag Generation  
  Provides the GPT-4o model optimized for social growth strategy.

â€¢ Parse Hashtag Output JSON  
  Validates hashtags and ensures JSON output is clean.

## ðŸŽ¨ AI Image Generation for Campaign Posts
Creates high-quality visual assets for each campaign post.

â€¢ Split Campaign Posts for Image Generation  
  Breaks the posts array into individual items for image generation.

â€¢ Generate Social Media Image Using AI  
  Uses DALLÂ·E 3 to create vivid, ultra-realistic brand-specific visuals.

â€¢ Upload Generated Image to Cloudinary  
  Hosts the generated image and returns a secure public URL.

## ðŸ•’ Optimal Posting Schedule Generation
Determines the best posting times for each platform.

â€¢ Generate Optimal Posting Schedule Using AI  
  Selects highest-engagement times for each platform (IST timezone).

â€¢ LLM Engine for Posting Schedule  
  Powers the scheduling intelligence using GPT-4o.

â€¢ Parse Posting Schedule Output JSON  
  Ensures the schedule matches strict schema and is ready for use.

## ðŸ“¦ Assemble Final Campaign Package
Combines all elements â€” images, captions, hashtags, schedule â€” into a unified payload.

â€¢ Combine All Campaign Assets  
  Merges outputs from captions, hashtags, images, and scheduling nodes.

â€¢ Prepare Final Campaign Package JSON  
  Formats final JSON containing images, captions, hashtags, and posting schedule.

â€¢ Send Final Campaign Package to Slack  
  Sends a beautifully formatted campaign package to your Slack channel.

## ðŸš¨ Error Handling 

 
Catches any workflow failure and posts an alert to Slack.  
Includes node name, error message, and timestamp for quick debugging.

main.node: Generate Optimal Posting Schedule Using AI

ai_languageModel.node: Generate Optimal Posting Schedule Using AI

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details: In n8n, when a workflow execution fails, it can start another workflow. This second workflow can be any arbitrary workflow on your n8n instance. Use the Error Trigger node as your Trigger in the Error workflow.
